name: ServiceNow Create Update and Close Incidents  with this Template
description: Interface to ServiceNow to create update and close incidents when performing service requests to CAM.

metadata.longDescription: Interface to ServiceNow to create update and close incidents when performing service requests to CAM.

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description: Not applicable, run locally on the Terraform Server.

bullets.title: Default Virtual Machine Settings
bullets.description:
python ServiceNow module deployed on the Terraform container.
This integration script is run locally on the terraform container.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. A ServiceNow instance must be available.
2. The ServiceNow instance must be network accessible from the Terraform container.
